## Bio

Blair Spence is a current student at The John Hopkins University Bloomberg School of Public Health in the Department of Epidemiology. She seeks to understand the contributions of biology, behavior, and social determinants to the development and manifestation of commodities in persons living with HIV as well as to design and implement tailored, acceptable interventions to improve health outcomes in this population.
